mapper.select: SELECT R.REPLY_NO AS replyNo , R.CONTENT , R.BNO , E.NICK AS writer , R.ENROLL_DATE AS enrollDate , R.MODIFY_DATE AS modifyDate , R.STATUS FROM NOTICE_REPLY R JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON R.WRITER = E.EMP_NO WHERE R.STATUS = 'Y' AND R.BNO = #{bno} ORDER BY R.REPLY_NO DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTICE_REPLY SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE REPLY_NO = #{replyNo}
